issue.title: [Rust] TPC-H parquet files cannot be read by Apache Spark
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10999](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10999). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The TPC-H parquet files generated by the benchmark crate cannot be read by Apache Spark because they use unsigned ints, which cannot be read in Spark (I am guessing because Java only has signed ints).

I would  like to use the same data sets for benchmarking DataFusion, Apache Spark, and other tools.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10999?focusedCommentId=17253277) by Jorge Leitão (jorgecarleitao):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8980
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8980>
